text: Rhopalomyia is a genus of gall midges, insects in the family Cecidomyiidae. There are at least 220 described species in Rhopalomyia. Rhopalomyia clarkei pupa ==See also== * List of Rhopalomyia species ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * ==External links== * * Category:Cecidomyiinae Category:Cecidomyiidae genera
title: Rhopalomyia
